title: Why do I install an update
body:
and now I can't logging into chat.

"Follow these instructions"

With patient and time maybe yes, but I just got from fkin work and just wanted to play with a friend. Why the fuck do I have to first, search a shitload of links and try a bunch of - what to me looks like nonsense "why will this one work?". 

I don't want to troubleshoot sh*t. "Well then don't play, bye"

Well fuck you too.

replies.body: This is currently a known issue where some players on EUW can't connect to chat.  A workaround for some players has been to log off the Friends App.  Otherwise, we'll be keeping updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Hang tight!
Thank you alot for taking the time to answer and, I'm really sorry for my manners :c. Anyways it's fine since yesterday
